snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles 3 - Selvaria at Naggiar [Extra Episode] [DLC]
snippet.description:
Valkyria Chronicles 3
Selvaria's Story:
Selvaria at Naggiar
September 1935
Mission: "The Azure Witch and the Battle-Maiden on Steel Horse"
Objective: Occupy enemy camp
Difficulty: ---
Weapon received: ユール (Yule) (sword)


The events preceding the battle at Naggiar were known from different perspectives. First from the Gallian side and in the last mission we saw them from the 422's POV. This time we'll see them from the Imperial side.
This piece of DLC tells the story of Selvaria and what she had to do before her clash with Alicia.


Join the GALLIAN LIBERATION FRONT!

http://www.facebook.com/GLFront
http://gallianliberationfront.blogspot.com/

http://www.petitiononline.com/vc3/petition.html

This game has enough surprises to not let anyone down. We need more people to show SEGA that we want this game in the West.
